channel.title: •a rather wierd question...•
channel.description: Ok, so my EdgeVille bank is next to where you start. It is kind of like an office. Right? So, I wanted to know if htere is a way to make it so the people outside cant see what we are typing. I doubt this is possible but hey, it's worth a shot.

item.title: •a rather wierd question...•
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Ok, this is not flame me. And BTW on the offtopic, why did you get muted? Project?

Read full topic

item.title: •a rather wierd question...•
item.dc:creator: @Razr1 Razr`
item.description:
@Razr1 wrote:

[quote=“Project Revolution, post:6, topic:233577”]We shouldn’t have to give them the packet numbers ect…

Its not a daycare where we hold their hands and show them everything…

They actually have to learn for themselves…[/quote][quote=“Project Revolution, post:6, topic:233577”]We shouldn’t have to give them the packet numbers ect…

Its not a daycare where we hold their hands and show them everything…

They actually have to learn for themselves…[/quote]

And where would you be if someone didn’t hold your hand at one point ?

Just check if they’re in the area like how most servers do for pking zones in the chat packet.

Read full topic

item.title: •a rather wierd question...•
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

_Vengeance:

… You don’t belong here then.

Half of the moparscape people don’t understand unless you give them packet numbers and code to insert. Yes, they are retards but you have to remember they are our retards.

Read full topic

item.title: •a rather wierd question...•
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Check to see whether someone is in an area or not before sending the chat update packets to the client.

Read full topic
